member.name: T:VetBusinessEntries.ActiveSubstanceInfo
member.summary: Class which represents the Active Substance information.

remarks.para: Transmits information between the application layers.

member.name: M:VetBusinessEntries.ActiveSubstanceInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ActiveSubstanceInfo class. Not receive parameters.

summary.para: Property which gets or sets a value for ActiveSubstanceId.
Active Substance identifier.
Property which gets or sets a value for Description.
Active Substance name.
Property which gets or sets a value for Active.
Indicates if the ActiveSubstance is enabled.
